column5: Talked to these people at the sport show. Dennis and Evelyn-have set of five cabins on Vista Lake outside of Savant Lake (the town). Anyone have any experience with these people or the lake?

I stayed with Vista Lake 2 years ago.Would recommend it to anyone.Our group of 8 had the island cabin and it was nice,plenty of room.The large screen porch was great.It had a large restaurant grillright on the porch.We did all our cooking out there.The lake isn`thuge so it doesn`t get too rough.The fishing was good.Hope this helps.
Can you give a few details concerning the fishing?

Our group was there in mid june.The walleyes seemed to run 17 to about20 inches.The biggest we caught was 26 inches.The biggest northernwas 31 inches.We mainly trolled rapalas or vertical jigged minnows.The lake is shallow,deepest I found on depthfinder was 36 feet.
